alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued October 12 at 11:39AM CDT until October 12 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WAUKESHA AND EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 1138 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Dousman, or 10 miles west of Wales, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Dousman, Rome, Eagle, Waterville, Sullivan, Summit and Nws Milwaukee/sullivan. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
